Write a game name and create it with the ADD-button. All games are listed on the screen and you can switch between them by clicking. \nGames can be deleted with the REMOVE button (This can not be undone!).
Game is played by clicking the screen. New statements are randomly selected from the library and shown in the screen. \nStatements can be added to the current game in the edit-tab.

Game can be renamed by clicking the game name and typing a new name. (Remember to hit enter on the keyboard to apply the name) This creates a new copy of the current game. \nThe old game can be deleted in the select game -tab. New statements can be added by typing in the new statement -field. Statements can also be selected and deleted with the REMOVE button. \nMultiple choices can be added to the statement with square brackets. Choices are separated with commas.

EXAMPLE: 
		 It's a [, beautiful, horrible] day! 
creates 3 different possibilities for the statement: 
		 It's a day! 
		 It's a beautiful day! 
		 It's a horrible a day! 
One of these statements is selected randomly in each round.
